name: Throw Wizard
description: This is a roguelite game filled with loot, monsters, fun visuals and characters. The game has a faction Leaders who help you along your way. There are a variety of Weapons to Loot, Earn, or Buy that will aid you against the many Monsters that roam the Dungeon. Other Items like armors provide Powerful Passive Bonuses that Protect you or Amplify your Damage output. You'll have to pick a playstyle based on the luck of the Items drop and either be aggressive or patient. Some Enemies are smarter than others and require advanced Tactics to outmaneuver. Whilst battling foes in the Dungeon you may come across a rare Currency that will increase your favor and reputation with the Faction Leaders of the Land. The Goblins, Golems, Slimes, and Chefs all wish to support you with their array of powerful items and bonuses.
